about_the_game:
Don't Be Sus is an immersive first-person action game that lets you explore a beautiful historical town and unveil its dark mysteries. Meet whacky characters, eat at restaurants, drink at bars, learn about the local history, find your way into restricted areas and investigate!

Your car broke down and you've been stranded in a remote small town with no money. Take on various odd jobs (or steal) so you can pay the mechanic to repair your car. But things might not be that simple... the local townsfolk are very suspicious of strangers so ... Don't Be Sus!

Key Features :

  • A Town Unlike Any Other

Explore a handcrafted stylized town inhabited by unique characters each with their own story and personality.

  • Get Around Without Getting Caught

The police is patrolling the streets so you better behave! Also any suspicious activity will be reported to the police by the townsfolk. Don't get on the wrong side of the law, because you will be punished!

  • Use Diverse Tools To Access Restricted Areas.

Find and use the right tools for the right job... just don't be suspicious.

  • Don't Let Your Intrusive Thoughts Win

Or do, both is fun! Punch, kick or throw various objects at people's faces. Fight if you have to !

name: Don't Be Sus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP/Vista
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible
